org.teamfarce.mirch.screens

Class InterviewScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.teamfarce.mirch.screens.AbstractScreen
      • org.teamfarce.mirch.screens.InterviewScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class InterviewScreen
extends AbstractScreen
    The InterviewScreen contains GUI for these GameStates: interviewStart, interviewQuestionStyle, interviewAccuse, interviewQuestion, interviewQuestionClue

      • questionStyleHandler

        private void questionStyleHandler(int result)
        Handles result of player selecting question style to use when questioning suspect Also updates personality meter based on result
        Parameters:
        result - Returns integer corresponding to question style type 0 = Aggressive, 1 = Conversational, 2 = Polite
